Subjects: inscriptions; sermons, verse in; Christ, love to sinners
_description: Inscriptions appear on a crucifix in an exemplum — six lines (ababcc).

Lam78.Transcription:
Wyth myn owyn herte blodI wysch the owt of sunneand the
                    forȝaf al thy gyltso redy I þou bygynneNow I make ioy wyth
                    theand here hwat thow prayst me
